bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with re xie 熱瀉 . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry long dan 龍膽 : 除胃中伏熱，時 氣温熱，熱泄下痢，去腸中小蟲，益肝膽氣，止驚惕 , “It eliminates hidden heat from within the stomach, seasonal qi of warmth and heat, heat outflow and discharge with free-flux illness, removes small bugs/worms from within the intestines, augments the qi of liver and gallbladder, and ends fearfulness”.
